meanings.definition: The state or quality of being cockeyed or askew.
meanings.sent1: The cockeyednesses of the painting made it look crooked on the wall.
meanings.sent2: Her glasses were always slightly crooked, adding a touch of cockeyednesses to her appearance.
meanings.sent3: The cockeyednesses of the mirror made everyone look taller than they actually were.
meanings.sent4: The cockeyednesses of his perspective made him see the world in a completely unique way.
meanings.sent5: The old house had a charming cockeyednesses to its structure, giving it character.

meanings.definition: A tendency to view things in a skewed or distorted manner.
meanings.sent1: His constant cockeyednesses in interpreting situations often led to misunderstandings.
meanings.sent2: The artist's work was known for its creative cockeyednesses, challenging viewers' perceptions.
meanings.sent3: Despite his cockeyednesses, he always managed to find humor in every situation.
meanings.sent4: Her cockeyednesses in analyzing data allowed her to come up with innovative solutions.
meanings.sent5: The writer's unique cockeyednesses brought a fresh perspective to the story, captivating readers.
